
```{r cargadatos, include=FALSE }
library(leaflet)
library(leaflet.extras)
```

```{r mapasbase, include=FALSE}
#Carga de mapas base
basemap <- leaflet() %>%
  # add different provider tiles
  addProviderTiles(
    "OpenStreetMap",
    # give the layer a name
    group = "OpenStreetMap"
    ) %>%
  addProviderTiles(
    "Esri.WorldImagery",
    group = "Satelital"
  ) %>%
  # add a layers control
  addLayersControl(
    baseGroups = c(
      "Satelital", "OpenStreetMap"
    ),
    # position it on the topleft
    position = "topleft"
  )
```
